DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , open label , randomize clinical trial enroll 40 generally healthy , postmenopausal woman age 40-65 year old . Women randomize one two oral dos MF101 4 week . Participants recruit 3 clinical site United States .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Assessing Safety MF101 Hot Flushes
DOC.detailed_description: MF101 oral , non-hormonal , botanical agent investigate treatment menopausal hot flash .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( partial list ) : Postmenopausal woman age 4065 year . Provide inform consent . Currently receive medical care health care provider . Other inclusion apply . Exclusion Criteria ( partial list ) : History malignancy nonmelanoma skin cancer cervical cancer diagnose fully treat less 5 year screen . Unexplained uterine bleeding within 6 month prior Screening . History deep vein thrombosis pulmonary embolism . Active liver disease history impair . Active gallbladder disease . Other exclusion apply .
